website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot A2200 is a solid point-and-shoot for basic snapshot needs with just enough extras to make it worth its price.
pros: The Canon PowerShot A2200 is a simple, reliable, and affordable compact camera that produces nice photos and movie clips
cons: The camera's shooting performance is slow

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for work as I needed something relatively cheap that I could throw in my laptop bag without worrying about damaging it, yet also took good pictures. This is working out great. The auto function is perfect for going right from shooting a picture of a car from far away right to getting a close detailed macro shot of a part label/serial number without having to mess with the settings. Picture quality is good for a camera at this price. Have had camera for almost 2 months now and haven't had to charge the battery yet, although I don't use it every day or for long periods of time. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mattciar95

customer_reviews.title: nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: My old Canon s400 elph stopped working and I needed something to take pictures with..this was a deal at $69..it is a nice camera,easy to use. The layout is basically the same as my old one so I didn't have much to learn,there is a learning curve with any new device,so take the time to play with it to understand how it works. The pictures are great,there is a difference from what you see on the LCD to uploading to your computer, but have some fun with it. I'm happy with it but all my cameras are Canons as are my printers. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sue B

customer_reviews.title: Powershot
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement camera for a Canon Powershot SD750 that had been the work horse of My wife's 5th grade class events for several years. It got damaged at a school event, and the kids were heart broken, as they quality of the images posted on the class website were always great. The new Powershot had a slight learning curve for all the features but has made a great appearance for the new school year! looking forward to many years of good use from yet another solid Canon camera.
customer_reviews.author: L. E.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Top quality, durable and stylish Bought it as a gift to my ex girlfriend’s mother No complaints at all, durable product 5/5
customer_reviews.author: dogangulen

customer_reviews.title: good working camera
customer_reviews.text: good camera. I expected it being bigger, it is though very small, more like ixus, not powershot. I had 530 before, getting used to this one. It doesn't delay shots as 530 did, waiting for the flash to charge. Not sure if it is plus, as because of this more opportunity of low quality photos with poor lighting. That is, you should control it yourself, not rush when taking photos. It was 8GB memory card included, charger, and 1 square battery.
customer_reviews.author: alenika

customer_reviews.title: Too slow and feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap digital camera that feels like it's made of cheap plastic and is very slow to respond. You have to wait at least a full second between taking pictures, which is not good when you are trying to get any kind of action shot, even with the supposed action mode. I would spend the extra money and get a camera that is capable of recording 1080p video as well, and that isn't made entirely of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I spent about a week researching camera's under $100 and finally decided on the Canon Powershot. I am not dissappointed! This camera is fantastic. It is super easy to use and takes great pictures. The charge lasts a long time. I only had to charge it the first time and the battery is still full. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a simple to use in-expensive camera that takes great pictures. I haven't used the vidoe feature yet so I can't comment on that but I'm sure it works well.
customer_reviews.author: G. G. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera it's simple to use, compact and light weight. I use it in a HatCam setup. I lost my first A2200 when a shark tipped over my Kayak. I tried a Fuji-Film XP-80 to replace it and it was horrible. I will never buy another Fuji-Film camera even though they are sort of waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely great quality and shipped the day after I ordered! I don't know if I ever had anything ship that fast. This is a perfect size for traveling! I've had this for a while now! It has been four years. I would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better cameras out there
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't one of the best cameras I bought from canon which really disappointed me. Sometimes when taking a picture it would come out with a yellow-ish background to it so maybe I need to adjust the settings but it took some time. The flash also makes the pictures not come out well either as it came out dark and sometimes blurry. Of course we can also just photo shop the lightning and all but I don't want to do that for every shot with this camera. Natural lighting was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kaiyan

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift... It's pretty cute and practical. But when we were at her daughters party, it gave us trouble, some of the pictures we were taking were blurry. Now idk if that happenstance because of lighting or what, but it happened a couple times, and we became frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Shoebuyer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good little camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's a good camera and does what I need it to do. The display was a little more scratched than I realized. But it was used - so it goes. It works well and all the functions and features work.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Canon A 2200 Camera
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the set. Shipped fast, well packaged. Setup time was quick and fairly easy. Camera is compact and easily carried. Prices on extra battery vary widely. Canon website $47.00, ebay $3.00 with shipping. (Long shipping time). Amazon $5.00 + Haven't used it much but seems to be a good deal. Would recommend it. Noticed what a friend used and choose it. Pops
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: Simple but great camera...
customer_reviews.text: I love Canon point & shoots. This is one of the cheapest ones, but the image quality is still great. It doesn't have too many advanced features, but it has everything what you would expect from camera for $100.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: slight lag time between firing and pressing firing button
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera on a daniel reetz diy bookscanner setup. The speed at which it takes pictures is sufficient. The time it takes to flip a page in between shots usually compensates for the slight firing lag time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A2200 Camera
customer_reviews.text: I just love this camera. I wanted a simple camera that took good pictures and this is the one. The pics are so clear and beautiful vivid colors. I have had compliments on my photos. I don't know why some reviews said the pics were blurry...none of mine have been and I am not experienced at all with cameras ! I would recommend this product .
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It is super easy to use and takes crystal clear pictures. I took pictures in a pitch black room on auto and they came out crystal clear. I have not had any blurry pictures. It is the best camera I think I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marciniak

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: this camera is reasonable priced. I bought two of them. they worked fine. but one of mine spoil. i recommend this camera for first timers.
customer_reviews.author: Dominica Man

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift. I like it for the very small price. I gave it to a child. Really nice and small and easily fits in your pocket. This camera lives up to the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Luisotti

customer_reviews.title: GOOD Enough
customer_reviews.text: I would thought it was be new 2012 type of camera but seem like a 2009 camera but it does work fine. I dont have any complaints for it right now except i need to know how to operate it because it seems so technical.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality camera, hight quality pictures!! excelents configurations options to make your pictures better!! came with al its accesories i recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: José Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CAMERA!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera on a deal, and I wouldn't have mind paying full price for it. It's so easy to use, customisable, and durable. Only downside, hard taking pics of moving objects at night properly...but other than, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Socamaniac

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I probably wouldn't buy this camera again, no issues, but just has afew features that are cumbersome. It doesn't take as good as pictures as my other canon camera, altho that one is much more expensive which is the powershot elph 300 HS. That camera is super good.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: neutral
customer_reviews.text: It has worked well. I bought it for my wife. She likes the convenience of her android phone for pics and video but she prefers the quality of this camera. She switches between the two. The Canon is okay, but I suspect it is just a learning camera for my wife. She is already wanting something more advanced. Mega-pixels are not the only indicator of a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grand son went on a school trip and took fantastic photos.
customer_reviews.author: amos t thompson jr

customer_reviews.title: and picture quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very functional, small, and picture quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A2200 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Product Pros: Compact Feel, Great Screen Resolution, Love the 'Discrete' Mode Cons: Non Metal Casing, Have to hold on to the button a bit before picture is actually taken
customer_reviews.author: subsydave

customer_reviews.title: Powershot great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for travel, use as family capture...Also works as a first digital camera for a kid. Easy to use, and has rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this camera for our trip to Alaska. We are not great photographers, but we got wonderful pictures. So easy to use, zoom worked very well for capturing wildlife in the distance.
customer_reviews.author: H. Peltier

customer_reviews.title: Great all around camera
customer_reviews.text: Have 6 of these in service now and haven't had any issues with them. They take great pictures, don't have embeded software so it works great with our Symantec SEP and network security structure.
customer_reviews.author: EvoBora

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The camera was good quality at a great price. No issues with performance and the picture quality is excellent. I would recommend for all purpose use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Product worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very basic camera worth the money. Go for it, enjoy your trips with easy snapshots. Those who are in need of camera that is too easy to use and not in need of extreme special quality, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Raghu

customer_reviews.title: Good value, a workhorse, very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: After - how many? - years of family use still doing quality work.
customer_reviews.author: RJM

customer_reviews.title: I used to hate taking pics or being in pics. Not anymore thanks Canon Powershot A2200
customer_reviews.text: I love my Canon! I can take all my pics alone & they come out GREAT! Unlike depending on my friends like I have in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: This is really a great value
customer_reviews.text: We paid 80, and this camera has been great for us. Great pictures and very handy. We can't believe a camera of this value works so well...
customer_reviews.author: Christina Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The product I received it in excellent condition, the pictures are really optimal, easy to use product, I recommend it. -
customer_reviews.author: Yudith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: not made as well as my old a470 but i''ll keep it .
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera, great zoom and auto focus. Light weight and comes with a lot of adapters which was a surprise. Takes great pictures and was a great bargain
customer_reviews.author: AJ's Review

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This camera is good. When I got it, I was so surprised at how small and sleek it is! Very adorable and easy to put in a purse or carry around. I got it as a present for my mom, so unfortunately, I cannot attest to the picture quality. I wouldn't even review it except that when I gave it to her, I was so disappointed because it does not come with ANY memory. If you buy this, you must purchase a memory card as well to even try the camera out.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Took this out to the lake in Canada, many outdoor pictures, from the float plane and boat, moving or still the camera took great pictures. Many commented on how good they were. All were taken with just the auto setting. Great Camera.
customer_reviews.author: Walley

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: After trying various point and shoot i kind of settled with one. Three things Ease of Use Good Quality even for indoor pictures Value of Money
customer_reviews.author: Poo

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera arrived in about 2 days, instead of the 5-8 days. which was awesome since I bought this item as a gift. The family who got the camera loves it. They really like the rechargeable battery and the fact that the menu is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: even though I own a canon rebel and several olympus pocket cameras,this is a handy, well thought out pocket camera. everything I need for most situations. I got what I expected plus a little more.
customer_reviews.author: alan a tomaric

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for, disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It is an okay camera. The quality of pictures it can take is less than that of my iphone 5. I dont even use it because my phone can take better pictures! Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: leah baltazar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a long time to actually find a camera that I liked and this one has extremely clear pictures and it's all good quality along with the amount of mega pixals. Overall, it's a great camera although I know it's been said that the actual quality of the camera isn't that great since the plastic seems frale, it's actually very sturdy because I have dropped it once already. But overall, GREAT CAMERA!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I take unforgettable pictures with this cute camera. It is so easy to operate it and I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mehr

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: If I had the time I would probably bore you with all the research and comparisons I made. Let's just say I'm really impressed with what this little camera can do! Also it's easy to operate, download to computer, edit, etc. and the price was definitely right.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money, really nice pictures!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to upgrade from an older model. It is a great point & shoot camera. It is easy to use, takes really nice pictures & downloading photos & videos is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for a great price and it served me well on a few trips I have been on already. Great quality pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Its very nice, compact, small and good product.. we liked it very much. Also the display, options provided are nice..
customer_reviews.author: Rajj

customer_reviews.title: Rebuilt Camera Didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work. We sent it back. The pictures were blurry, the view screen had lines through it. Very disappointed. This was a rebuild by the manufacturer. Canon tried to charge us for the repair because we only had the Amazon receipt. After some back and forth they finally decided they would repair it at no charge but didn't have the parts to repair the camera and sent us a replacement free of charge. It turned out OK, but was a bad experience that shouldn't have been that way. The shipping to send it back for repairs cost us an additional $16. We wish we hadn't made the original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E. Funk

customer_reviews.title: easy camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, excellent resolution, even zoom. Very portable, is the complement for a bigger camera, for example, in a complicated trip, or bike trip. I recomend this, in addition, it is a canon.
customer_reviews.author: miguel martinez

customer_reviews.title: Wrong parts sent
customer_reviews.text: The camera I purchased was sent with a charger that was not a cannon charger. Let alone, a charger that wasn't even compatible with the camera's battery. When I contacted the sender, his response was ' did u plug it in from the wrong direction?' REALLY.... I'm still waiting to see my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great camera takes nice pictures
customer_reviews.text: got this for my mom for Christmas easy to use and takes nice pictures. Camera is great but description was a little vague and had several scuffs on the screen but overall a great camera.
customer_reviews.author: austin83339

customer_reviews.title: NICE CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS CAMERA BECAUSE OLD CAMERA DIED. NEEDED A CAMERA FAST AS GRADUATION DAY WAS APPROACHING. THOUGHT THIS CAMERA WOULDN'T BE WORTH THE MONEY. BUT OVERALL ITS A GOOD CAMERA FOR THE PRICE AND IT TAKES EXCELLENT PICTURES.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: i love this camera.It takes great pictures and is the perfect size. The only downside is that the battery life on this camera does not last long. Thats the only thing so far but other than that this is a wonderful camera for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: kjerod

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this camera! It is small and compact, and takes wonderful pictures. We love the high quality of video it takes! Perfect camera for perfect price!!
customer_reviews.author: washercan4

customer_reviews.title: mid price, low quality
customer_reviews.text: I have Nikon D40 DSLR. I figured I should have something compact for trips and such. It produces the lowest quality pictures I ever saw, especialy in low lighting. Stay away from this camera !!!
customer_reviews.author: Aric

customer_reviews.title: stupid
customer_reviews.text: cheating,this one never working,no battery inside,click button is not functioning,led screen completely scratched,i hate it ,they said it is look like brand new but nasty
customer_reviews.author: soni abraham

customer_reviews.title: camera dead in a weak
customer_reviews.text: This product went dead in 20 clicks....did not expected this from Canon Pictures were very nice, video was good too but ZERO reliability
customer_reviews.author: canonfail

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review before, but I had to share my disappointment with this camera! I have owned Canon Powershot cameras for over 8 years but the quality of this was is so poor that I'm returning it to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Armstrong

product_meta.title: Canon Powershot A2200 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackWith Canon's 4943B001 PowerShot A2200 Black 14MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Zoom and 2.7 In. Display gorgeous images are possible for any level photographer thanks to Smart AUTO, a system that detects what is going on in the scene, then automatically and intelligently selects proper settings based on 32 pre-defined shooting situations. Capture memories beautifully either as still images, or videos in incredibly realistic 720p HD. The camera is loaded with fun, useful features you will love like Discreet Mode that lets you shoot in restrictive situations by operating noise, and flash-free, and Creative Filters for an easy way to add professional-looking artistry to your photography.What’s in the box: Canon Powershot A2200 Digital Camera (Black), Battery Pack NB-8L, Battery Charger CB-2LA, Wrist Strap WS-800, AV Cable AVC-DC300, USB Interface Cable IFC-400PCU, Digital Camera Solution CD-ROM and 1-Year Manufacturer's Warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Everything’s Easy.
Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings for the camera based on 32 predefined shooting situations.


Just set the Canon PowerShot A2200 digital camera to Smart AUTO and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture-taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 32 specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images.





Smart AUTO
The camera automatically selects the best shooting settings for optimal quality based on subjects and environmental factors to provide point-and-shoot simplicity.





P Program
Access advanced exposure compensation features while shooting mostly automatically.





Live View Control
Enables Brightness, Color, and Tone adjustments to your images using easy-to-understand controls.





Easy
Keep the image quality as high as possible for fail-proof images.





Blur Reduction
Boosts sensitivity to enable faster shutter speeds, reducing the effects of camera shake and subject movement.





Portrait
The camera sets a large aperture, focusing the subject and artistically blurring the background to make your subject “pop.”





Landscape
For front to back sharpness, the camera sets a small aperture.





Kids & Pets
Reduced focusing time freezes fast-moving subjects, so you won’t miss those special shots.





Smart Shutter
The camera automatically takes the photo when people smile, wink, or get into frame.





Low Light
For high quality image capture in an amazing range of dimly-lit situations.





Beach
Get clear shots of people at a sunny beach without darkened faces.





Foliage
Capture brilliant shots of autumn foliage, greenery and blossoms.





Snow
Shoot clear snow scenes without darkened subjects or an unnatural bluish tint.





Fireworks
Grab brilliant images of skyrocketing fireworks.





Long Shutter
Use to blur moving subjects for artistic effect, ideal for urban night photography.





Creative Filters
The Creative Filters mode dial setting provides easy access to special filter effect and scene modes.





Fisheye Effect
Add a classic photo distortion without a fisheye lens.





Miniature Effect
Give images a miniature look with an effect that emphasizes perspective by blurring the top and bottom of the image.





Toy Camera Effect
Simulates photos taken with “toy” or pinhole cameras, darkening the image at the edges to create a vignette effect.





Monochrome
Choose from three single-tone effects: Black-and-White, Sepia, or Blue.





Super Vivid
Super Vivid intensifies existing hues, saturating the scene with bright colors.





Poster Effect
Poster Effect combines several similar shades into one color, turning subtle gradations into eye-catching, scene-popping contrasts.





Movie
Shoot in HD (1280 x 720) at 30 fps for up to 22 min. and 05 sec. or 4GB per clip. Shoot in VGA (640 x 480) at 30 fps or for up to 50 min. and 17 sec. or 4GB per clip and QVGA (320 x 240) at 30 fps for up to 3 hour 2 min. and 52sec. or 4GB per clip.


In Still Images or 720p HD Video, Every Detail is Beautifully Preserved
Capture memories your way as either still images or in 720p HD video.
PowerShot A2200 digital camera puts you in charge when it comes to saving your memories. Canon technology lets you capture beautiful still images no matter what your level of photographic experience. Portraits of people posing or in motion, outdoor shots in various weather situations, nighttime shooting and more: the camera handles them all with ease when you shoot in Smart AUTO. High megapixel counts let you blow up and crop your still images just as you please, with no loss in resolution or quality.
Want to capture the good times in motion? Canon’s 720p HD video gives your memories the quality they deserve. If you’ve never shot video in high definition before, you’ll be amazed at the difference it makes. 720p HD delivers stunning realism, capturing every detail with a level of clarity that, in playback, will bring you right back into the moment. Easy high definition videos from a compact still camera – now that’s value!




Loaded with Features, Packed with Value.
Easy to use, powerful A-Series camera has 14.1 Megapixels with 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom (28mm wide).
With the PowerShot A2200, dramatic, personal pictures have never been easier to shoot and share. This 14.1 Megapixel camera lets you create impressive large photos of family and friends you'll be proud to display. The high-resolution images taken by the PowerShot A2200 can be enlarged up to 13" x 19". The PowerShot A2200 has a 4x wide Optical Zoom lens (35mm film equivalent: 28–112mm) that let you capture up-close and memorable images.



14.1 Megapixel Resolution See the Image on a Big Screen.
Large, clear 2.7-inch LCD makes taking and viewing images a breeze. 
The PowerShot A2200 digital camera has a large 2.7-inch LCD screen that gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high-resolution screen offers a crisp, clear and bright picture. It also features Night Display for easy viewing in low light.





2.7-inch LCD Screen Shoot without Distractions. 
New scene mode: Discreet Mode disables the sound, flash and AF beam so you can capture images in quiet areas.
How many times have you found yourself in a situation where you wanted to take a picture, but were reluctant (or simply not allowed) to disrupt the setting with noise or flash? New Discreet Mode makes picture-taking possible in museums, at performances, anywhere light and sound would not be welcome. Simply turn the mode dial to Discreet, and the camera’s sound, flash and AF assist beam will be disabled – without changing any other settings. If the camera senses low light, ISO speed will be automatically raised to get the best possible shot. You can even switch to playback mode to review still images or video, and the camera will remain muted. 





Photographic Artistry That’s Easy for Anyone
Creative Filters offers fun and artistic ways to capture photos.
Creative Filters Mode gives you lots of fun, easy ways to make your photography more creative. The camera does all the work – you simply choose an effect and shoot!
Fisheye Effect imparts a fun, familiar curvilinear distortion to your image that’s ideal for kids and pets. Miniature Effect plays with perspective, giving any shot the look of a world created in much smaller proportions – great for landscapes and city shots. When you shoot in Toy Camera, you get the vintage effect of a first-generation camera, ideal for giving portraits a slightly distorted, unevenly saturated look of a picture you’d come across in your attic. Monochrome lends a moody beauty to your photography, producing shots in Black & White, Sepia or Blue. Super Vivid saturates colors to heighten the intensity and impact of any shot. Poster Effect takes away transitions between objects in the frame to give your image the high-impact look of a hand-painted poster.





Charge Up and Go!
Lithium-ion battery offers an easy alternative to recharge the battery.
The Canon PowerShot A2200 digital camera uses a lithium-ion battery. This compact, powerful battery helps make it a lightweight and slim camera. Charge-up is quick and easy, so the PowerShot A2200 will be ready and waiting for those special moments.





A Bold Pop of Color.
Comes in 4 cool, crisp colors to match any personality: Blue, Black, Silver and Red.
There's nobody else quite like you. So naturally, you demand a camera that is utterly you...like the Canon PowerShot A2200. This camera makes getting what you want remarkably easy. Exquisitely compact, its design has smoothly curving edges. And it comes in four distinctive colors that let you tell the world who you really are. Express yourself as quietly or as boldly as you like. Simply take your pick from the stylish range of shades. There's a choice of Red, Blue, Silver or Black. Every color tells its own story and each creates a wonderful impression of you.
feature_bullets: 14.1 megapixels with 4x wide-angle optical zoom (28mm wide)
Smart Auto intelligently selects settings from 32 predefined shooting situations
Discreet Mode disables the sound, flash and AF beam for use in quiet areas

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars121 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
